name: Maria Rita
description: '''Maria Rita''' ({{IPA|pt|maˈɾiɐ ˈʁitɐ}}; born 9 September 1977, [[São Paulo (city)|São Paulo]]) is a Brazilian singer. Born '''Maria Rita Camargo Mariano''', she is the daughter of famed pianist/arranger [[César Camargo Mariano]] and the late Brazilian singing legend [[Elis Regina]] and sister to [[Pedro Mariano]] and music producer [[João Marcelo Bôscoli]]. Her namesake is family friend and famed Brazilian rock legend [[Rita Lee]]. She studied at [[New York University]], and worked as a journalist at a magazine for adolescents.
